description: The flagship Charles de Gaulle is in quarantine in Toulon, with a third of its 2,000 crew infected.
title: Coronavirus: 668 infected on French aircraft carrier Charles de Gaulle
title_page: Coronavirus: 668 infected on French aircraft carrier Charles de Gaulle - BBC News
maintext: The number of carriers available is limited and there are never enough. The US Navy is taking drastic measures. The carrier USS Harry S. Truman, at the end of a seven-month mission, is being held offshore, to ensure that at least one carrier is ready for a short-notice surge deployment if required.
